info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 18 at 2:42PM MST until August 18 at 4:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 242 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain along Pierce Ferry Road east of South Cove. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... South Cove. This includes the following roads... Pierce Ferry Road between mile markers 43 and 44. Although storms have moved away from South Cove and Pierce Ferry Road, flooding due to runoff is still possible and additional storms may move into the area this afternoon. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
